attributes.action: Scrap Thought for the Day on the Radio 4 Today Programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a world of religious terrorism and extremeism the Today Programme sets a dangerous precendence in allowing 2 minutes of free airtime to religious leaders to espouse their views. Just like politicians, religious commentators and leaders should have their views rigorously questionned by the presenters. The Prime Minister should urge Today Programme editors to scrap this outdated ideal to demonstrate the inaccuracies of some of these do called commentators views.
